name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A rolling montage of heartfelt fan messages and illustrations from around the world, celebrating Hoshimachi Suisei's milestone solo concert at Nippon Budokan.
Announcement screen indicating that the concert performance will begin shortly.
Important notice regarding venue safety guidelines, including warnings about flashing lights and confirmation that vocal cheering is permitted.
Continuation of the fan message montage as the live event approaches.

subtitles.original: Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live SUPERNOVA
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei Nippon Budokan Live SUPERNOVA

subtitles.original:
武道館ライブおめでとうございます！
すいちゃんに出会えて本当によかったです！
subtitles.english:
Congratulations on your Budokan live!
I'm so glad I met you, Sui-chan!

subtitles.original:
夢が叶う瞬間を一緒に過ごせて幸せです。
いつまでも応援しています！
subtitles.english:
I'm happy to witness your dream come true.
I'll always be rooting for you!

subtitles.original:
Congratulations on your Budokan Live!
祝 武道館 ライブ
subtitles.english:
Congratulations on your Budokan Live!
Celebrating the Budokan Live

subtitles.original:
Start our dream stage!
SUPER NOVA
subtitles.english:
Start our dream stage!
SUPER NOVA

subtitles.original:
Budokan! I am witnessing history...
I will support you until the end!
subtitles.english:
Budokan! I am witnessing history...
I will support you until the end!

subtitles.original:
Congratulations on achieving
Dream of Performing at Budokan
subtitles.english:
Congratulations on achieving
Dream of Performing at Budokan

subtitles.original:
ずっとずっとついていきます！
夢の舞台へ！！
subtitles.english:
I will follow you forever!
To the stage of dreams!!

subtitles.original:
開演までしばらくお待ちください
The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
演出の都合上、照明の明滅にご注意ください
声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights.
Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original:
祝 武道館ライブ！
すいちゃん、大好きです！！
subtitles.english:
Celebrating the Budokan live!
Sui-chan, I love you!!
